about_the_game:
From the extraordinary mind of Felicia Day and featuring an all-star voiceover cast as your NPCs, Object of my Affection is a love story like no other. A chance meeting at Ye Olde Fun Faire sets the party on a noble quest to reunite two lovers, torn apart by circumstance (someone lost a finger. It wasn’t pretty). Just because they’re Dupes – shape-shifting monsters – doesn’t mean that they don’t deserve a happy ending. Can the party deliver?

This adventure is perfect for Level 1 Mages, but it's easy to rebalance combat encounters as needed.

INCLUDES

  • A One-Shot Adventure written by Felicia Day (around 4-5 hours of gameplay)

  • Featuring the voices of Felicia Day, Tom Lenk, Erika Ishii, Anjali Bhimani, Jonah Ray, and Jeffrey Lewis

  • A Game Master Guide that minimizes prep

  • 4 Animated Environments (1 variant)

  • 2 Animated Battlemaps

  • 5 Characters/Creatures

  • 1 Music Track

  • 9 Inventory Items
